translation.en: I'm stuck !
- Get back. - [ Barking ]
- Mr. Tweedy. - Eh ?
What is that chicken doing outside the fence ?
translation.ko: 왜 닭이 밖에 나와 있는 거야?

translation.en: Oh ! [ Chuckles ] I don't know, love. I--
Just deal with it. Now !
I'll teach you to make a fool out of me.
Now let that be a lesson to the lot of ya !
translation.ko: 다들 새겨들어! 트위디 농장에 탈출이란 없다!

translation.en: No chicken escapes from Tweedy's farm !
Morning, Ginger. Back from holiday ?
I wasn't on holiday, Babs.
translation.ko: 휴가 간 거 아냐, 뱁스 독방에 갇혔었지

translation.en: I was in solitary confinement.
translation.ko: 휴가 간 거 아냐, 뱁스 독방에 갇혔었지 혼자만의 시간을 가졌으니 좋겠네?

translation.en: Oh, it's nice to get a bit of time to yourself, isn't it ?
[ Clears Throat ] Roll call !
Come along now. You'll be late for parade.
Pip, pip. Quick march. Left, right, left, right.
translation.ko: 삐악삐악, 빨리빨리! 왼발 오른발 왼발 오른발

translation.en: Left, right, left, right ! Come on. Smarten up. Ooh !
translation.ko: 왼발 오른발 왼발 오른발! 똑바로들 못 하나!

translation.en: Discipline ! Order !
Back in my R.A.F. days when the senior officer called for a scramble,
translation.ko: 내 RAF 시절엔 상관이 출격 명령을 내리면

translation.en: you'd hop in the old crate and tallyho.
Chocks away ! Give over, you old fool. They just want to count us.
translation.ko: 오버 좀 그만해요 숫자 세는 것뿐인데

translation.en: Oh, how dare you talk back to a senior ranking officer.
translation.ko: 어딜 감히 상관한테 덤비는 건가! - 내 RAF 시절엔... - 파울러, 사람들이 와요!

translation.en: - Why, back in my R.A.F. days- .- Fowler, they're coming. Back in line.
translation.ko: - 내 RAF 시절엔... - 파울러, 사람들이 와요!

translation.en: -Oh, right, right. -Oh !
There will be a stern reprimand for you, lad. You're grounded.
translation.ko: 곧 문책 당할 줄 알아 넌 이제 외출 금지야

translation.en: Attention !
Welcome back, hen. Is there a new plan ?
I thought we tried goin' under.
Ah ! Over. Right.
How's the egg count ?
I've laid five eggs this morning. Five !
translation.ko: 난 오늘 다섯 개나 낳았어 다섯 개!

translation.en: Shush ! Well-chuffed with that, I was--
translation.ko: - 그 정도면 짱이라고... - 쉿! "달걀 생산 기록"

translation.en: Oh, no. Edwina.
Bunty, why didn't you give her some of yours ?
translation.ko: 번티, 네 것 좀 나눠 주지 그랬어?

translation.en: I would have. She didn't tell me. She didn't tell anyone.
Oh, is Edwina off on holiday ?
[ Sighs ] We've got to get out of here.
Ginger ! Are we still on ?
Oh, we're on, all right.
Spread the word, Mac. Meeting tonight in hut 17.
translation.ko: 가서 전해, 맥 오늘 밤 17번 닭장에서 회의다

translation.en: You called ? Nick and--
Fetcher. At your service.
Over here.
We need some more things.
Right you are, miss.
How about this quality handcrafted tea set ? Uh, no.
Or this lovely necklace and pendant ? It's love--
Or this beautiful little number,
translation.ko: 아니면 파리 닭장 패션계에서 선풍적 인기를 끌고 있는

translation.en: all the rage in the fashionable chicken coops of Paris.
translation.ko: 아니면 파리 닭장 패션계에서 선풍적 인기를 끌고 있는 신상품은 어떠세요?

translation.en: Simply pop it on like so,
and as the French hens say, " Voila !"
That's French.
That's two hats in one, miss. For parties, for weddings.
Oh, but madame, .this makes you look like a vision, like a dream.
translation.ko: 이걸 쓰면 꿈꾸던 모습으로 변신할 수 있답니다

translation.en: - Like a duck. - No, thank you.
We're making this. We need these things. Can you get them ?
translation.ko: 이걸 만들 재료가 필요해요 구할 수 있겠어요?

translation.en: Oh, oh, oh, this is a big job, miss.
Oh, bigger than the others. No, no. This is gonna cost.
translation.ko: 전보다 규모가 커요 이런, 돈이 좀 들겠는데요

translation.en: Same as always. One bag of seed.
You call this pay ? It's chicken feed.
- What else could we give you? - Eggs.
- Eggs ? - Eggs.
- We can't give you our eggs. They're too valuable. - And so are we.
translation.ko: 달걀은 못 줘요 너무 귀하다고요 우리도 마찬가지죠

translation.en: After you, Fetcher.
translation.ko: "쏜의 엑스트라 슈퍼 크림 캔디" 펫처, 앞장서

translation.en: After I what ?
Move ! Ooh !
Twenty-two and nine.
Fourteen shillings and threepence.
Seven and sixpence times three.
Two and nine.
Fourpence halfpenny.
D-oh ! Stupid, worthless creatures !
I'm sick and tired of making minuscule profits.
Hmm !
Oh, yes.
Those chickens are up to something.
Quiet. I'm onto something.
[ Mr. Tweedy ] .They're organized. I know it.
- I said, quiet. - That ginger one.
I reckon she's their leader.
- Mr. Tweedy ! - [ Gasps ]
I may finally have found a way to make us some real money around here,
translation.ko: 드디어 진짜 돈을 벌 방법을 찾아냈는데

translation.en: and what are you on about ?
Ridiculous notions of escaping chickens.
-But-- But-- -It's all in your head, Mr. Tweedy. Say it !
translation.ko: - 하지만... - 당신 상상일 뿐이야 따라 해!

translation.en: It's all in me head. It's all in me head.
Now, you keep telling yourself that,
because I don't want to hear another word about it.
- Is that clear ? - Yes, love.
But you know that ginger one--
They're chickens, you dolt !
Apart from you, they're the most stupid creatures on this planet.
translation.ko: 당신만 빼면 지구상에서 가장 멍청한 족속들이라고!

translation.en: They don't plot, they don't scheme, and they are not organized !
translation.ko: 작전 같은 건 세울 수도 없고 조직은 짤 능력이 안 돼!

translation.en: - [ Chattering ] - Order ! Order !
- Quiet, everyone. Settle down. - [ Chattering ]
I would like to call to order- Please, if you could just settle--
translation.ko: 조용히 해 여기 좀 봐 모두 정숙! 여러분, 모두 자리에...

translation.en: Let's have some discipline in the ranks ! What, what !
translation.ko: 모두 정숙! 여러분, 모두 자리에... 여긴 상관에 대한 예의도 없나? 꼭꼭!

translation.en: - Thank you, Fowler. - In my R.A.F. days,
we were never allowed to waste time with unnecessary chitchat.
translation.ko: 쓸데없는 잡담에 시간 낭비하는 건 금물이었다

translation.en: Yes, thank you, Fowler.
Right ! [ Chuckles, Clears Throat ]
Carry on.
Now, I know our last escape attempt was a bit of a fiasco,
translation.ko: 지난번 탈출 시도는 대실패였다는 거 알아

translation.en: but Mac and I have come up with a brand-new plan.
translation.ko: 하지만 맥과 내가 새 작전을 짰어

translation.en: -Right. We tried going under the wire and that didn't work. -Show 'em, Mac.
So, the plan is, we go over it.
- [ Murmuring ] - This is us, right ?
We get in like this.
Wind her up and... let her go !
Good grief ! The turnip's bought it !
Farmer's coming !
Operation Cover-up !
-Mr. Tweedy ! - Ooh. Ouch.
-Where are you ? - Ooh. It's all in your head.
It's all in your head. It's all in your head.
Think, everyone, think. What haven't we tried yet ?
translation.ko: 다들 생각해봐 안 해본 방법 없어?

translation.en: We haven't tried not trying to escape.
Hmm. That might work.
What about Edwina ?
How many more empty nests will it take ?
Perhaps it wouldn't be empty if she'd spent more time layin' and less time escapin'.
translation.ko: 탈출한답시고 쏘다니는 대신 알 낳는 데 신경 썼으면 살아있을지도 몰라

translation.en: So laying eggs all your life...
translation.ko: 평생 알이나 낳다가 털 뽑히고 속 채워져서 구이 신세가 돼도 좋다고?

translation.en: and then getting plucked, stuffed and roasted is good enough for you, is it ?
translation.ko: 털 뽑히고 속 채워져서 구이 신세가 돼도 좋다고?

translation.en: It's a livin'.
You know what the problem is ?
The fences aren't just round the farm. They're up here in your heads.
translation.ko: 철조망은 농장 주위에 있는 게 아니라 너희 머릿속에 있어

translation.en: There's a better place out there somewhere beyond that hill,
translation.ko: 밖엔 더 좋은 곳이 있다고! 언덕을 넘으면

translation.en: and it has wide open spaces and lots of trees...
translation.ko: 밖엔 더 좋은 곳이 있다고! 언덕을 넘으면 나무도 많고 풀도 많은

translation.en: and grass.
translation.ko: 나무도 많고 풀도 많은 평야가 있을 거야

translation.en: Can you imagine that ? Cool, green grass.
- Who feeds us ? - We feed ourselves.
translation.ko: - 모이는 누가 줘? - 우리가 챙겨 먹어야지

translation.en: - Well, where's the farm ? - There is no farm.
- Then where does the farmer live ? - There is no farmer, Babs.
translation.ko: - 그럼 농부는 어디 살아? - 거긴 농부도 없어

translation.en: - Is he on holiday ? - He isn't anywhere. Don't you get it ?
translation.ko: - 휴가 가는 거야? - 아예 없다니까, 모르겠어?

translation.en: There's no morning head count, no farmers, no dogs and coops and keys...
translation.ko: 아침마다 점호도 없고 농부, 개, 닭장, 열쇠, 철조망

translation.en: and no fences.
In all my life I've never heard such a fantastic...
load of tripe !
translation.ko: 내 평생 처음으로 이런 대단한... 헛소리를 다 듣네

translation.en: Oh, face the facts, ducks.
The chances of us gettin' out of here are a million to one.
translation.ko: 우리가 여기서 탈출할 확률은 백만 분의 1이야

translation.en: Then there's still a chance.
Oh, no, oh, no, oh, no. What am I doing ?
translation.ko: 말도 안 돼 내가 뭐 하는 거지?

translation.en: Who are you trying to fool ? You can't lead this bunch of--
translation.ko: 누가 내 말에 속겠어? 나 같은 애가 뭘 한다고...

translation.en: [ Grunts ] Oh, heaven help us.
Freedom ! Huh ?
Thank you, ladies and gentlemen. You've been a wonderful audience.
translation.ko: 신사 숙녀 여러분, 제 공연을 관람해주셔서 감사합니다

translation.en: That's it. [ Barking ]
Get him inside quickly.
This is our way out of here.
We'll make posters ?
No. What's on the poster, Babs. What's on the poster. We'll fly out !
translation.ko: 아니, 포스터 내용을 봐 날아서 나가는 거야!

translation.en: He must be very important to have his picture taken. What do you suppose he does ?
translation.ko: 사진까지 찍을 정도면 굉장한 수탉인가 봐 - 직업이 뭘까? - 보면 몰라?

translation.en: Isn't it obvious ? He's a professional flying rooster.
translation.ko: - 직업이 뭘까? - 보면 몰라? 비행 전문 수탉이잖아

translation.en: He flies from farm to farm, giving demonstrations.
-Do you suppose ? -Oh, absolutely.
Not in the dark, no. No, not in there. No.
translation.ko: 밤엔 안 돼 거긴 안 돼, 안 돼

translation.en: Get out. Good. Gotta get--
[ Gasps ] Who are you ? Where am I ? What's goin' on ?
Ouch ! What happened to my wing ?
You took a rather nasty fall.
And sprained the anterior tendon connecting your radius to your humerus.
translation.ko: 요골을 상완에 연결하는 전방 힘줄을 삐어서

translation.en: I gave it a wee bit of a tweak, Jimmy, and wrapped her up.
- Was that English ? - She said you sprained your wing. She fixed it.
translation.ko: - 그거 외국어요? - 날개를 다쳤는데 - 고쳤다고요 - 내가 붕대 감았어요

translation.en: -I made the bandage. -I-I carried you in.
translation.ko: - 고쳤다고요 - 내가 붕대 감았어요 내가 옮겼어요

translation.en: [ Chuckles ] Let's back up and start from the top. Where am I ?
translation.ko: 맨 처음부터 다시 합시다 여기가 어디죠?

translation.en: You're right. How rude of us. We're just very excit--
This is a chicken farm.
And we're the chickens.
Yeah, with you so far. Chicken farm, chickens--
I don't like the look of this one. His eyes are too close together.
translation.ko: 관상이 마음에 안 들어 미간이 너무 좁잖아

translation.en: -Father, please. -And he's a Yank !
Easy, Pops. Cockfighting's illegal where I come from.
And where is that exactly ?
Just a little place I call the land of the free and the home of the brave.
translation.ko: 자유의 땅이자 용기의 본고장이라 불리는 곳이죠

translation.en: - Scotland ! - No ! America.
[ Together ] Oh ! America.
Poppycock. Pushy Americans. Always showing up late for every war.
translation.ko: 헛소리! 거만한 미국 놈 같으니 전쟁 때마다 늦는 지각생 주제에

translation.en: Overpaid, oversexed and over here !
translation.ko: 돈 밝히고 섹스 밝히는 미국 놈이 여긴 왜!

translation.en: Hey,what's eatin' Grandpa ?
Oh, don't mind him, Mister-- Mister ?
The name's Rocky. Rocky the Rhode Island Red. Rhodes for short.
translation.ko: 록키 로드 아일랜드 레드 줄여서 록키 로드죠

translation.en: -Rocky Rhodes ? -Catchy, ain't it ?
Um, Mr. Rhodes, is this you ?
Uh, who wants to know ?
A group of rather desperate chickens.
You see, if it is you, then you just might be the answer to our prayers.
translation.ko: 이게 당신이라면 당신이 바로 우리 기도의 답일지 몰라요

translation.en: Well, then, call me a miracle, doll face, 'cause that's me.
And what brings you to England, Mr. Rhodes ?
Why, all the beautiful English chicks, of course.
Give over !
You see, I'm a traveler by nature.
I did that whole barnyard thing for a while, but I couldn't really get into it.
translation.ko: 한동안 농장에서 살아 봤지만 도저히 적응 안 되더군요

translation.en: Hi. How are you ? Nope.
The open road. That's more my style.
translation.ko: 안녕, 아가씨? 맞아요! 뻥 뚫린 길! 그게 내 스타일이에요

translation.en: Yep, just give me a pack on my back and point me where the wind blows.
translation.ko: 그래서 배낭 하나 둘러메고 바람 부는 방향으로 떠났죠

translation.en: In fact, you know what they call me back home ?
You're gonna love this. The Lone Free Ranger.
-Ooh ! -Isn't that great ?
-Oh, it's possible, all right. -I knew it was possible.
I knew the answer would come. Amen !
We're all going to fly over that fence, and Mr. Rhodes is going to show us how, right?
translation.ko: 우린 철조망을 날아서 넘을 테고 로드 씨가 그 방법을 알려줄 거야, 그렇죠?

translation.en: That's-- What ? Did you say "fly" ?
-You can teach us. -No, I can't.
- Listen. Shh. You hear that ? - [ Silence ]
translation.ko: 이 소리 들려요? 길이 날 부르는 소리요 아쉽지만 가야겠군요, 안녕

translation.en: That's the open road calling my name, and I was born to answer that call. Bye.
translation.ko: 길이 날 부르는 소리요 아쉽지만 가야겠군요, 안녕

translation.en: He must have very good hearing.
Okay, okay, where's the exit ? Ah, this way.
Mr. Rhodes, um, perhaps I didn't explain our situation properly.
translation.ko: 로드 씨, 상황 설명을 잘 못 한 것 같은데요

translation.en: We lay eggs day in and day out,
and when we can't lay any more, they kill us.
translation.ko: 알을 못 낳으면 농부가 우릴 죽이죠

translation.en: It's a cruel world, doll face. You might as well get used to it.
Which part of "they kill us" do you not understand ?
I got my own set of problems to worry about.
Besides, this birdcage can't be that hard to bust out of.
translation.ko: 그리고 이 닭장에서 도망치는 건 쉽겠는데요

translation.en: In fact, watch me.
It's not so hard to get one chicken out of here or even two,
translation.ko: 한두 마리가 도망치는 거면 어렵지 않겠지만

translation.en: but this is about all of us.
translation.ko: - 모두 함께 가야 해요 - 모두 함께?

translation.en: - All of you ? - That's what I've been trying to tell you.
translation.ko: - 모두 함께 가야 해요 - 모두 함께? 여태 그 말 한 거잖아요

translation.en: Wait a minute. Let me get this straight.
You want to get every chicken in this place out of here at the same time ?
translation.ko: 여기 있는 닭들을 모두 동시에 탈출시키겠다고요?

translation.en: -Of course. -You're certifiable.
You can't pull off a stunt like that. That's suicide.
Where there's a will, there's a way.
translation.ko: 뜻이 있는 곳에 길이 있는 법이죠

translation.en: Couldn't agree more. I will be leaving that way. But--
translation.ko: 맞는 말씀입니다 내 뜻은 떠나는 겁니다 하지만...

translation.en: -Mr. Rhodes ? -♪I'm the type of guy ♪
-Please ! -♪That likes to roam around I'm never in one-- ♪
translation.ko: - 제발요 - 방랑을 즐기는 남자 절대 한 곳에...

translation.en: So that's it. You're from the circus.
You're on the run, aren't you ?
You wanna keep it down ?
I'm trying to lay low here. [ Doorbell Ringing ]
I should turn you in right now.
-You wouldn't. Would you ? -Give me one reason why I shouldn't.
translation.ko: - 설마요, 할 거요? - 하지 말아야 할 이유를 대요

translation.en: Because I'm... cute ?
Hey, hey, hey ! What kind of crazy chick are you ?
It's a cruel world. Do you know what'll happen if he finds me ?
translation.ko: 들키면 내가 어찌 되는지 알아요? 세상은 잔인한 거죠

translation.en: I just decided. I don't like you.
I just decided. I don't care. Now, show us how to fly.
-With this wing ? -Teach us then.
-No ! -[ Squawking ]
[ Squawking ] He's valuable, you say ?
-Sure. -Get the torch.
Now you listen here, sister. I'm not going back to that life.
translation.ko: 잘 들어요, 아가씨 난 안 돌아갈 거요

translation.en: I'm a Lone Free Ranger. Emphasis on free !
And that's what we want. Freedom !
[ Chuckles ] .[ Ginger ] Fancy that. They're coming this way.
Oh, oh, no. No. Oh, no. They're on to me.
translation.ko: 안 돼, 안 돼! 잡혀가게 생겼네!

translation.en: Teach us to fly and we'll hide you.
- And if I don't ? - [ Squawks ]
Was your father by any chance a vulture ?
Do we have a deal ?
Time to make good on that deal, doll--
The name is Ginger.
- Comfortable ? - Not really.
-Maybe this will help. -[ Grunts ] Nice hideout.
Ouch. I had more room in my egg.
We've held up our end of the deal. Tomorrow you hold up yours.
translation.ko: 우린 약속 지켰으니까 내일 당신 약속 지켜요

translation.en: -What deal ? -The flying !
Yeah, yeah, yeah. Right, right, right. Don't worry. I'll teach you everything I know.
translation.ko: 알았어요, 내가 아는 건 다 알려줄 테니 걱정 마요

translation.en: Now, which bunk is mine ?
Absolutely outrageous !
Asking a senior officer to share his quarters...
translation.ko: 상관의 공간을 마구 나눠 쓰라 하다니!

translation.en: and with a noncommissioned Yank, no less.
Why, back in my day, I'd never-- Hey !
You weren't exactly my first choice either.
And scoot over. .Your wing's on my side of the bunk.
translation.ko: 저리 좀 가세요, 날개가 제자리를 침범했잖아요

translation.en: Your side of the bunk ? The whole bunk is my side of the bunk !
translation.ko: 네 자리? 이 침대는 전부 내 자리야!

translation.en: Just-- What's that smell ? Is that your breath ?
translation.ko: 그냥... 무슨 냄새죠? 설마 입 냄새?

translation.en: It's absolutely outrageous.
[ Rocky ] So you wanna fly, huh ?
Well, it ain't gonna be easy, and it ain't gonna happen overnight either.
translation.ko: 쉽진 않을 거요 하룻밤에 될 일은 아니죠

translation.en: You see, flying takes three things.
Hard work, perseverance and--
-Hard work. -You said hard work twice !
That's because it takes twice as much work as perseverance.
translation.ko: 인내보다 노력이 두 배는 더 필요하니까요

translation.en: Codswallop ! [ Mutters ]
Now, the most important thing is we have to work as a team,
translation.ko: 가장 중요한 건 우린 한 팀이란 겁니다

translation.en: which means... you do everything I tell you.
translation.ko: 그러니 전부 내 지시에 따르도록 해요

translation.en: Right ! Let's rock and roll.
Mrs. Tweedy ! The chickens are--
Pecking ?
[ Rocky ] And left, two, three. And right, two, three.
translation.ko: 왼쪽 둘 셋 오른쪽 둘 셋

translation.en: And... stop right there. Oh, yeah, down.
Down. Yeah, yeah, make little circles. That's it. Faster.
Faster. Oh, yes. Perfect.
Oh, that's the spot. [ Sighs ]
I thought you were going to teach us how to fly.
That's what I'm doing.
Isn't there usually some flapping involved ?
Hey, do I tell you how to lay eggs ?
Relax. We're making progress.
Really ? I can't help feeling we're going around in circles.
translation.ko: 그래요? 내가 보기엔 제자리만 맴도는 것 같은데요

translation.en: What the-- Hey ! Cut it out ! You're making me dizzy.
I think they're ready to fly now.
Good, because they certainly can't walk anymore.
Up and at 'em, gals. Let's flap.
Watch, Fetcher. Let's see if old Attila the Hen has come to her senses.
translation.ko: 잘 봐, 펫처 여왕 닭이 정신 차렸나 보자고

translation.en: It's raining hen ! [ Screaming ]
What's this caper, love ? We're flying.
translation.ko: - 뭔 짓 하는 거요? - 날고 있어요

translation.en: Obviously.
They're gonna kill themselves. Look at this, Fetch. Flippin' hell.
translation.ko: - 맙소사, 저것 좀 봐 - 자살하려나 봐

translation.en: -Wanna watch ? -Yeah, all right.
Hey ! Careful of those eggs !
Now they're over easy !
[ Nick ] Definitely scrambled.
Go ! Go ! Go !
Go, go, go, go ! Go !
Poultry in motion !
Birds of a feather flop together.
translation.ko: 깃털 달린 새들이 함께 날개를 퍼덕이네

translation.en: Great work, ladies. Great work !
The pain you're feeling is a good thing. It's good.
translation.ko: 통증을 느낀다는 건 아주 좋은 신호죠

translation.en: Pain is your friend, okay ? It's a positive thing.
Just keep the faith there, uh- What was your name ? Agnes ! You'll get there.
translation.ko: 믿음을 갖고... 이름이 뭐더라? 아그네스! 성공할 거예요!

translation.en: Ducky, I think you flew four feet today.
Right, four feet ! From the roof to the ground.
It's all part of the process, ladies. Nothing to worry about.
translation.ko: 1m 맞아요! 지붕에서 땅바닥까지! 성공하는 과정이니까 걱정할 것 없어요

translation.en: [ Whispers ] Ya cheese-eating little--
That doesn't sound good. Ha, ha, ha.
Okay, the ground's shaking. Are we worried ?
Are we worried ?
The circus. Quick. Hide me.
-Hide me. -Come on.
translation.ko: - 어서! - 이리 와요 미친놈처럼 날개 퍼덕여 봐야 이런 훈장을 받을 순 없지

translation.en: One isn't awarded a medal like this for flapping about like a lunatic, what.
translation.ko: 미친놈처럼 날개 퍼덕여 봐야 이런 훈장을 받을 순 없지

translation.en: [ Stammers ] Now, see here ! This is an officer's quarters.
translation.ko: 미친놈처럼 날개 퍼덕여 봐야 이런 훈장을 받을 순 없지 뭐 하는 거냐! 여긴 내 구역이라고!

translation.en: -Quick. In here. -Get out of here immediately, sir !
translation.ko: - 안으로 가요! - 당장 나가! 좀 봐줘요, 영감님

translation.en: Give it a rest, Pops.
translation.ko: 좀 봐줘요, 영감님 당장 나가! 안 나가면 고소할 테다!

translation.en: Out of here ! I shall have you on a charge within the week.
translation.ko: 당장 나가! 안 나가면 고소할 테다!

translation.en: Cheers, mate.
It's all in your head. It's all in your head.
It's all in your head.
What-- What-- What's all this then ?
This is our future, Mr. Tweedy.
No more wasting time with petty egg collection and minuscule profits.
translation.ko: 이제 달걀이나 팔며 푼돈에 신경 쓸 필요 없어

translation.en: No more eggs ? But we've always been egg farmers.
translation.ko: 달걀을 안 판다고? 대대로 달걀 팔며 살았는데? 아버지, 할아버지 그 위의 조상님들까지 전부...

translation.en: Me father and his father and all their fathers. They was always--
translation.ko: 아버지, 할아버지 그 위의 조상님들까지 전부...

translation.en: Poor ! Worthless. Nothings.
But all that's about to change.
This will take Tweedy's farm out of the dark ages...
and into full-scale automated production.
[ Gasps ] Melisha Tweedy will be poor no longer.
I'll put it together then, shall I ?
This isn't good, Mac.
Whatever's in those boxes is for us, and I don't think it's softer hay.
translation.ko: 우리한테 쓸 물건일 텐데 부드러운 짚은 절대 아닐걸 맞아 기분 잡치긴 싫지만

translation.en: Aye, hen. And I hate to be the voice of doom,
but I've been calculating my figures, and I just don't think we're built for flyin'.
translation.ko: 수치를 계산해 봤는데 우리 몸으로는 날 수가 없어 하지만 내가 봤는걸 록키는 철조망을 넘어왔어

translation.en: But I saw him. He flew in over that fence.
translation.ko: 하지만 내가 봤는걸 록키는 철조망을 넘어왔어

translation.en: Aye, aye, I believe you,
but if we could just see it for ourselves, that may answer some questions.
translation.ko: 하지만 우리 몸을 보면 자꾸 의문이 드는걸

translation.en: You're right. I'm sorry.
We've been at this all week, and we're getting nowhere.
If his wing were better, he could-- Oh ! I'll have a word with him.
translation.ko: 날개가 다른 거라면... 록키하고 상의해 볼게

translation.en: Where is he ?
They didn't give me this medal for being a Yank nanny.
translation.ko: 양키나 돌보라고 이 훈장 받은 줄 아냐?

translation.en: A simple "I don't know" would suffice.
Beware of that one, young Ginger.
That Yank is not to be trusted.
translation.ko: 그놈 조심해, 진저 그 양키는 믿을 놈이 못 돼

translation.en: That Yank is our ticket out of here.
And the pig says to the horse, "Hey, fella, why the long face ?"
translation.ko: 그 양키가 우리 탈출 열쇠예요 돼지가 말한테 이러는 거야 '얼굴이 왜 말상이야?'

translation.en: Oh. Cocktail !
Give over !
translation.ko: 닭 꼬리 칵테일! 그만 좀 해요

translation.en: So, um, anyway--
Remember those flying tips tomorrow. They're very important.
translation.ko: 내가 알려준 비행 정보는 중요하니까 까먹지 말고

translation.en: Keep thinking those flighty thoughts.
They're swell chicks. They really are.
Look at what Babs made me. A beak warmer. Isn't that the cutest ?
translation.ko: 뱁스가 이것도 만들어 줬어요 부리 마스크, 귀엽죠?

translation.en: And that Bunty. [ Laughs ] She really packs a punch.
Is there a problem here ?
Have we flown over that fence ? Not quite.
- Then there's a problem. - Good things come to those who wait, doll face.
translation.ko: 그럼 문제가 있는 거죠 기다리는 자에게 복이 오는 법이오, 아가씨

translation.en: Ginger !
To do what ? Okay, how long did it take you ?
To learn how to fly.
Apples and oranges, baby doll. I'm gifted. They're not.
translation.ko: 어떻게 나랑 비교해요? 난 타고났고 아가씨들은 아니니

translation.en: You can't compare the two, okay ?
The point is, these things take time.
Which we are rapidly running out of.
We haven't even lifted off the ground. Why ? Thrust.
translation.ko: 땅에서 뛰어오르지조차 못 하잖아요, 왜죠? - 추진력 - 뭐?

translation.en: I went over my calculations, and I figured the key element we're missing is thrust.
translation.ko: 계산해 봤는데 중요 요소 중에 추진력이 빠졌더라고

translation.en: I-I didn't get a word of that.
Thrust ! Other birds like ducks and geese,
translation.ko: 추진력! 오리나 거위가 땅에서 날아오를 때

translation.en: when they take off, what do they have ? Thrust.
translation.ko: 추진력! 오리나 거위가 땅에서 날아오를 때 이용하는 힘이 바로 추진력이에요

translation.en: I swear she ain't usin' real words.
Oh, thrust. She said we need more thrust.
Well, of course, we need thrust. Thrust and flying are like this.
translation.ko: 물론 추진력이 필요하죠 추진력과 비행은 이런 거예요 이게 비행, 이게 추진력이죠

translation.en: That's flying and that's thrust.
translation.ko: 추진력과 비행은 이런 거예요 이게 비행, 이게 추진력이죠

translation.en: -Would you excuse us ? -Aye.
Ah, the wing, the wing, the wing.
If we don't see some results by tomorrow, the deal is off, and you're on your own.
translation.ko: 내일까지 결과가 안 나오면 거래 끝, 당신 혼자예요

translation.en: No more hiding. The farmers will find you, and it's back to the circus, flyboy.

translation.en: You're the first chick I ever met with the shell still on.
Sleep tight, angel face. The Rock's on the case. [ Clicks Tongue ]

translation.en: Ginger !
[ Fowler Clears Throat ] Cock-a-doodle-doo ! What, what.
[ Nick ] Oh, it was a beaut, guv'nor. Hmm ?
A fine piece of work, if I do say so meself.
-I say so meself too. -I wish I could have seen it.
translation.ko: - 내 생각도 그래요 - 봤으면 좋았을 텐데

translation.en: We slipped into the farmer's room, all quiet like.
-Like a fish. -Yeah, and we--
"Like a fish" ? You stupid Norbert.
Anyway, guv, here it is.
El merchandiso. That's Spanish.
- What are these two crooks doing here ? - So, you know each other.
translation.ko: - 이 사기꾼들은 왜 왔죠? - 아는 사이군요?

translation.en: She don't think we're valuable.
Guys, you are without a doubt the sneakiest,
translation.ko: 왜들 이래요? 내가 만난 동물 중에

translation.en: most light-fingered thieving parasites I've ever met.
translation.ko: 최고의 사기꾼이자 가장 손이 빠른 기생 도둑인데

translation.en: Oh, don't, don't. Stop it. I've gone bright red.
translation.ko: - 무슨 그런 칭찬을 다 - 얼굴 빨개지잖아요

translation.en: So, uh, how about them eggs ?
Yep ! Eggs ? Don't tell me you promised them--
translation.ko: - 그럼 달걀은? - 달걀? - 설마 달걀 주겠다고... - 그래요

translation.en: Promised them every egg I lay this month.
translation.ko: 내가 이번 달에 낳은 달걀을 다 주기로 했죠

translation.en: And when can we expect the first installment ?
I'm brewing one up as we speak, guys. I'll keep you posted.
translation.ko: 지금 낳을 준비 중이니까 곧 연락할게요

translation.en: Pleasure doing business with you, sir.
Sucker.
-What ? -You've lied to them.
I didn't lie, doll face. I just... omitted certain truths.
translation.ko: 거짓말 아니에요, 아가씨 사실을 좀 숨겼을 뿐이죠

translation.en: I'll give them exactly what I promised.
-Which is nothing. -Which is what I'll give them.
translation.ko: - 줄 게 없잖아요 - 없으면 없는 대로요

translation.en: And what will you give us ?
Thrust !
[ Rocky ] You okay, sweetheart ? Good, good.
Now this is just a little helper.
Something to get you going. It's a thrust exercise.
translation.ko: 날아갈 수 있게 하는 추진력 연습이죠

translation.en: The tension's killing me. It's gonna kill her !
- Release ! - Whoa !
Come on ! Flap !
You can do it. Flap, flap, flap !
translation.ko: 할 수 있어! 날개를 펄럭여! 펄럭! 펄럭!

translation.en: Yes, yes, yes !
Is that your first offense ?
Roll call ! I haven't laid any eggs.
-Hide me. -Three days and not one.
- Oh, no ! -Why didn't you tell us, Babs? - Hide me !
translation.ko: - 숨겨줘요 - 사흘 연속 못 낳았어 - 왜 이제 말해? - 숨겨 줘요 비행 연습에 너무 바빠서...

translation.en: We've been so busy with the flying--
-They're coming ! -Hide me !
Hide yourself !
Double their food rations, Mr. Tweedy.
I want them all as fat as this one.
translation.ko: 모두 이 녀석처럼 포동포동 찌워야 해

translation.en: All of me life flashed before me eyes !
It was really borin'.
Chicken feed. My favorite !
Wait. Wait.
No. Wait !
Babs, please ! Bunty ! Stop it ! Wait !
Stop !
Stop it !
Something is wrong here. Can't you see that ?
Strange boxes arrive in the barn.
translation.ko: 이상한 상자들이 오더니 뱁스가 알을 안 낳았는데도 잡아가지 않고

translation.en: Babs stops laying, but they don't take her to the chop,
translation.ko: 뱁스가 알을 안 낳았는데도 잡아가지 않고

translation.en: and now they're giving us extra food.
translation.ko: 오히려 모이까지 더 줬어 이래도 모르겠어? 우릴 살찌우려는 거야

translation.en: Don't you see what's happening? They're fattening us up.
-They're going to kill us all. - [ Gulping ]
Whoa, whoa ! Heavy alert. [ Laughs ]
-She didn't mean that, gals. -Do you mind ?
Keep eating. Save some for me.
translation.ko: 계속 먹어요 내 것 좀 남겨주고

translation.en: What are you doing ? How dare you ! Let go of me !
translation.ko: 뭐 해요? 감히 누굴! 이거 놔요!

translation.en: Listen. I've met some hard-boiled eggs in my day,
but I'd say you're about 20 minutes.
-What's that supposed to mean? - It means you got to lighten up.
Over in America, we have this rule.
If you want to motivate someone, don't mention death.
translation.ko: 동기를 유발하고 싶다면 '죽음'이란 단어는 피해라 웃기네요, 이곳의 규칙은 항상 진실을 말하는 거예요

translation.en: Funny. Over here, the rule is: Always tell the truth.
translation.ko: 웃기네요, 이곳의 규칙은 항상 진실을 말하는 거예요 그래서 일이 퍽도 잘 풀렸네요

translation.en: That's been working like a real charm, hasn't it ?
Here's some free advice. You want them to perform ? Tell them what they wanna hear.
translation.ko: 충고할까요? 성공하고 싶으면 닭들이 원하는 말을 해 줘요

translation.en: You mean lie.
Here we go again. You know what your problem is ?
translation.ko: 또 시작이군요 당신 문제가 뭔지 알아요?

translation.en: You're... difficult.
Why ? Because I'm honest ? I care about what happens to them,
translation.ko: 왜요? 솔직해서요? 난 저 닭들이 걱정돼요

translation.en: something I wouldn't expect a lone free ranger to know anything about.
translation.ko: '외로운 자유의 방랑자'는 절대 그럴 일 없겠지만요

translation.en: If this is the way you show it, I hope you never care about me.
translation.ko: 이런 식이라면 내 걱정은 하지도 마요

translation.en: -I can assure you, I never will. -Good !
Fine !
What's all this ?
Well, here she is. Ask and you shall receive.
- That's biblical. - That's real craftsmanship is what it is.
-Solid as a rock. -Ooh !
[ Static ] It's supposed to do that.
- It's perfect, guys. - And how's that egg coming ?
This is a double yolker.
I don't see what this has to do with-- ♪[ Jazz ]
You will.
We've been workin' too hard.
Time to kick back a bit, shake those tail feathers.
translation.ko: 이제 긴장 풀고 꼬리털 좀 흔들어 봅시다

translation.en: Look at him. Nellypodging around like a--
translation.ko: 저것 좀 봐 엉덩이 흔드는 게 꼭...

translation.en: Oh, good heavens. What's happenin' ?
That's called a beat, sister. Feel it pulsing through your body ?
translation.ko: 그게 바로 비트란 거죠 몸이 쿵쿵 울리지 않나요?

translation.en: Oh, yes. Pulsing. Fancy that.
Hey, well, then go with it, baby.
Oh, my. Look ! I'm going with it !
translation.ko: 어머나, 이것 좀 봐 음악에 몸을 흔들고 있어!

translation.en: Bunty, what's got into you ?
translation.ko: 번티, 어떻게 된 거야? 너도 마찬가지 같은데?

translation.en: Same thing that's got into you apparently.
♪I don't care if I die ♪ Just go with the flow, gals!
♪Flip, flop, fly ♪ Let it go !
Now, see here. I don't recall authorizing a hop.
Oh, shut up and dance.
[ Crying ] What are you sobbing about, you nancy ?
Little moments like this, mate. It's what makes the job all worthwhile.
translation.ko: 이런 순간들 때문에 내 직업이 보람찬 것 같아

translation.en: Wanna dance ?
Yeah, all right.
[ Giggles ] Did ya see that ? I flew !
Attagirl, Babsy. Attagirl.
Well-- Oh ! Your wing. It's better.
-How about that ? -Fantastic.
You can fly for us tomorrow.
Uh, uh, yeah, so it seems.
I flew ! I flew !
Looks like I owe you an apology.
I didn't think you cared about us, but after all this--
translation.ko: 우린 신경도 안 쓰는 줄 알았는데 이걸 보니...

translation.en: Well, it seems I was wrong.
Hey, easy, Miss Hard-boiled.
I might think you're turning soft.
Uh, listen, there's something I got to tell ya.
I-- .[ Rumbling, Electricity Crackles ]
- [ Chattering ] - No. You'd better wait here.
Ooh, that's champion, that is. What is it ?
It's a pie machine, you idiot.
Chickens go in, pies come out.
Ooh ! What kind of pies ?
- Apple. - My favorite !
Chicken pies, you great lummox ! Imagine it.
translation.ko: 닭 파이지, 이 머저리야! 상상해 봐

translation.en: In less than a fortnight, every grocers' in the county...
will be stocked with box upon box...
of Mrs. Tweedy's Homemade Chicken Pies.
Just Missus ?
Woman's touch. Makes the public feel more comfortable.
Oh, right. How does it work ?
[ Gasps ] Get me a chicken and I'll show you.
translation.ko: 닭 한 마리 잡아 오면 보여 줄게

translation.en: I know just the one.
I've got a score to settle with you.
Bloomin' heck ! They've got Ginger !
We mustn't panic. We mustn't panic !
translation.ko: 당황하면 안 돼 당황하면 안 돼

translation.en: [ All Screaming ] [ Fowler ] Quiet there !
Quiet, I say ! Let's have some discipline, what, what.
translation.ko: 조용히 하라니까! 질서 좀 지켜! 꼭꼭!

translation.en: The enemy has taken a prisoner. This calls for retaliation !
-Retaliation ! -What's going on ? What's happening ?
They got Ginger, Mr. Rhodes. They're taking her to the chop !
Well, what are you waiting for, laddie ? Fly over there. Save her !
translation.ko: 뭘 꾸물대나? 당장 날아가서 구해 와!

translation.en: Of course-- No, no ! No, that's just what they'd expect.
translation.ko: 그래야... 안 돼요! 그건 예상하고 있을걸요

translation.en: But I say we give them the old element of surprise.
translation.ko: 그러지 말고 옛날 방식으로 반격하죠 '바지 벗겨서 사로잡기' 같은 거?

translation.en: And catch Jerry with his trousers down.
I like the sound of that. What's the plan ?
The plan-- The plan.
The plan-- Uh, Babs !
Give me that thing. Bunty, give me a boost.
translation.ko: 이리 줘요 번티, 나 좀 올려 줘요

translation.en: Whoa. Look at the size of that thing.
Oh, no !
Chickens go in,
pies come out.
[ Chuckles ] Chicken pies.
Not-- Not apple pies.
[ Mr. Tweedy ] Chicken !

our lives. For saving
